data.description: *****MOTIVATED SELLER*****Spacious Home Conveniently located in the Heart of Port Charlotte just off of Midway Blvd, within a short Drive to everything, Shopping, Dining, Port Charlotte Beach Complex, Charlotte Harbor, Boating, Fishing, Golf, Tennis, Pickleball, Punta Gorda and North Port, Ideal Home for First Time Home Buyers, or that Winter Retreat you are Looking for. This Charming Three (3) Bedroom, Two (2) Bath Home, One (1) Car carport, with Open Living Space from the Living Room and Kitchen, Sliders open up for you to Enjoy the Screened Patio overlooking the Backyard giving way to More Living Space, plus room to add a Pool if desired. We invite you for a Tour Today.
